mapper.sql: EQUIPMENTID, OSVERSION, COMPUTERNAME, PCI, USB, PATH, RAM_EXCHANGEAREAUSE, PARTATIONUSE, IDLERAM, OS_TIME_USERNUM_LOAD, OSLOAD, FIREWALL, ROUTINGTABLE, HASCONTACT, NETWORK, PROCESS, REALTIMEPROCESS, ACTIVEUSER, BIOS, NETWORKCARD
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tbl_server
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_server (EQUIPMENTID, OSVERSION, COMPUTERNAME, PCI, USB, PATH, RAM_EXCHANGEAREAUSE, PARTATIONUSE, IDLERAM, OS_TIME_USERNUM_LOAD, OSLOAD, FIREWALL, ROUTINGTABLE, HASCONTACT, NETWORK, PROCESS, REALTIMEPROCESS, ACTIVEUSER, BIOS, NETWORKCARD) values (#{EQUIPMENTID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSVERSION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{COMPUTERNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PCI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PATH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RAM_EXCHANGEAREAUSE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PARTATIONUSE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDLERAM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OS_TIME_USERNUM_LOAD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSLOAD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FIREWALL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ROUTINGTABLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HASCONTACT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NETWORK,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROCESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REALTIMEPROCESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ACTIVEUSER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BIOS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NETWORKCARD,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
